title: Best of the Program | Guests: Megyn Kelly & Michael Shellenberger | 3/1/22
description:
Journalist Megyn Kelly joins to give some insight on what’s going on in Vladimir Putin’s head and what his intentions might be. Author Michael Shellenberger joins Glenn to discuss America’s energy dependence on foreign countries. Glenn discusses the latest from the World Economic Forum and the new digital ID system.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
